definition: A person who holds a position of authority in a local government, typically responsible for the administration and governance of a town or city. This term is commonly used in German-speaking countries to refer to the elected official who serves as the head of a municipality.

examples.english: The mayor manages the city administration.

examples.german: Der Bürgermeister wurde von den Bürgern gewählt.
examples.english: The mayor was elected by the citizens.

examples.german: Der Bürgermeister vertritt die Stadt nach außen.
examples.english: The mayor represents the city externally.

examples.german: Der Bürgermeister nimmt an wichtigen Veranstaltungen teil.
Der Bürgermeister setzt sich für die Belange der Bürger ein.
examples.english: The mayor advocates for the concerns of the citizens.
